member.name: IDesktopGadget.RunGadget
member.summary: Adds an installed gadget to the desktop.

param.name: gadgetPath
param.para: Pointer to the full (absolute) path of a .gadget folder. A gadget that is not packaged with Windows can only be run from one of the two following locations. Installation of the gadget in any other location will cause this method to fail with an access denied error.
param.div: Note This path should not contain environment variables; the fully expanded path must be provided. can be used to expand the path to the form required in this parameter.
param.para: This is the recommended path for non-Microsoft gadget installation, available to all users.
This location should be used for a single-user installation of the gadget.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: An error occurred involving the path of the gadget folder pointed to by gadgetPath.

member.name: IDesktopGadget
member.summary: Exposes a method that allows the programmatic addition of an installed gadget to the user's desktop.
